pr_title: Ensure no overflow for Date type

timeline.message: Ensure no overflow for Date type

Reuse converted value

This silences a warning in the code.

Remove ineffective replace invocation

`Long.toBinaryString` does not produce leading (nor any other) spaces,
so the `replace` call was a no-op.

timeline.author: wendigo

replies.bodyText: The value is already verified explicitly above, so not needed. Also, intellij recognizes this and doesn't emit a warning here.
replies.author: findepi

replies.bodyText: I've seen that. Wasn't that on purpose (I guess not)?
replies.author: sopel39
